definition: (astronomy) any of the nine large celestial bodies in the solar system that revolve around the sun and shine by reflected light
details:
noun
- (astronomy) any of the nine large celestial bodies in the solar system that revolve around the sun and shine by reflected light
= synonyms: major planet
- any celestial body (other than comets or satellites) that revolves around a star
- a person who follows or serves another
= synonyms: satellite
